name: Touch My Katamari
description:
Roll everything from tiny ants to skyscrapers in this exhilarating 'Shape-changing and Ball rolling' title. Use the touchscreen or the traditional controls to roll! Change the ball's shape with the flip of your fingers, expand the ball on a vast space or squeeze into gaps. Challenge more missions by downloading more contents! See if you can break the records of friends around with the 'near' application. Packed with addictive features such as collection, shopping and many more!
